environmental.title: Tender environmental objectives
environmental.description: A True/False field to indicate if the tender has environmental objectives. Required by the EU

social.title: Tender social objectives
social.description: A True/False field to indicate if the tender has social objectives. Required by the EU

innovation.title: Tender innovation objectives
innovation.description: A True/False field to indicate if the tender has an objective of buying innovative work. Required by the EU

additionalInformation.title: Tender objectives additional information
additionalInformation.description: Further details about the objectives of the procurement. Required by the EU

Objectives.title: Tender objectivess
Objectives.description: Details about the tender's objectives: environmental, social and/or for innovation. Required by the EU
